title: Consecrated labrys
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|An axe with a delicate blessing placed on it by one of the sacred Seraphim, so that worthy adventurers would rid this world of demons. Rejoice, for it has ways of bringing courage to its wielder in even the darkest places...}} [[File:Consecrated labrys.png]] '''''the Consecrated labrys''''' +4 holy axe (modified [[broad axe]]: +1 base damage) [[Holy]] brand
Allows [[flight]]
[[See Invisible]]
[[Fragile]]
Gets bonus enchantment as scarier enemies come into view ==Mechanics== For every "high" [[threat]] enemy in [[line of sight]], the labrys gains +3 enchantment. For every "lethal" threat enemy, it gains +9 enchantment. The maximum enchantment is +16.{{source ref|0.31.0|art-func.h|311}}{{source ref|0.31.0|player-reacts.cc|283}} See the [[Threat]] article for how a monster's threat is determined. ==Desirability== The '''Consecrated labrys'''{{source ref|0.31.0|art-data.txt|1760}} is, at minimum, a +4 broad axe of holy wrath, which is already a great weapon for the [[extended game]]. The labrys will frequently raise its enchantment, making it even stronger. Any reasonably threatening monster will count as "tough", so reaching a +13 or +16 enchantment is quite easy. During the 3-rune portion of the game, the labrys can still be a great weapon. While its brand will rarely be effective, it will frequently get to a high enchantment. ==History== *The Consecrated labrys was added in [[0.30]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Axes]]
